short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Live.pics.io recreates the expirience of real-world slideshows

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Miss the days of real-world slideshows, when your guests would come by to see your vacation photos and hear you tell the story behind the shots? The app reproduces that experience online and lets a group of people across the Internet see and discuss a group of images.
